text: Lowo ufudukayo (emke kowabo) ngenxa ka-Allâh uya kufumana emhlabeni iindawo zokuhlala ezininzi nokuphila okuninzi ngoAllâh. Kananjalo lowo ushiya iwabo aze abe ngumngcucalazi ka-Allâh noMthunywa waKhe, aze asutywe kukufa, inene umvuzo walowo uyimfuneko enkulu ukuba awufumane kuAllâh kwaye uAllâh nguMxoleli, uSozinceba
